hillborn.name: Hillborn
hillborn.description:
With greyish blue skin partially covered by
dark tattoo-like lines and patterns, these
humanoids bear a variety of horns growing from
their temples and are known for their quick legs.

hearthborn.name: Hearthborn
hearthborn.description:
With dark-orange skin, colorful hair and round
noses, these humanoids can boost their muscles for
a few bare seconds by pumping their blood faster
and hotter, unleashing steam from their bodies.
